Page.Name: ScrollPage
Page.Text: Visit Uberfuzzy at 17 Tranquil Way South Qeynos

Page.Name: SelectedPage
Page.Text: :5f6b97aeaf09212c:[DEVL]N to seller and M to broker

Text.Name: AutoInventoryMsg
Text.Tooltip: :5f6b97ae960bd90b:Hold shift to create a new stack

Page.Name: InfoPage
Page.Text: :5f6b97ae59b5d197:Using the broker, you can sell items to other players even while offline. Start by dragging normal or special vending container or special broker container to one of the empty Lots. Next, drop items into the lots and set your desired selling price.

Progressbar.Name: CapacityProgressbar
Progressbar.Tooltip: :5f6b97ae4c5403fb:The capacity of your currently selected Lot.

Button.Name: TakeCoinButton
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97aeb8e74752:This is the amount of coin you have waiting to be picked up.
Button.TooltipDisabled: :5f6b97aea5cb3782:There is no coin left in this lot to pick up.

Page.Name: CurrentCoinPage
Page.Tooltip: :5f6b97aeb8e74752_1:This is the amount of coin you have waiting to be picked up.

Button.Name: CommandRemoveOne
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97ae7299a6b5:Remove one of the selected items. Hold shift to select a quantity to remove. Or hold control to remove the stack.

Button.Name: CommandRemoveQuantity
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97aea1ad2ae5:Open up the quantity window to specify how many to remove.

Button.Name: CommandRemoveItem
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97ae96984f6f:Remove the item from the consignment lot.

Page.Name: SalesLogPage
Page.Text: :5f6b97aef6314505:<date time> wwwwwwwwwwww buys a large freshwater trout for 1p
